entry.title: [RBX8][DedicatedServers] - Rack R808L05
entry.content:
Jan 6, 07:01 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/01/2023 04:46 UTC
End Time : 06/01/2023 06:30 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 6, 04:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/01/2023 04:46 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack R808L05 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
